verbose_text: Thus, persistent inflammation can increase GABA induced depolarization by affecting Cl - homeostasis in DRG neurons, while ablation of NKCC1 or pharmacological inhibition by bumetanide increases the latency in the hot plate or tail flick tests and alleviates thermal and mechanical hypersensitivity after sciatic nerve lesion.
evidence: NKCC1 or pharmacological inhibition by bumetanide
